title: Christie Brinkley and daughter stun at SI festival | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Christie Brinkley, Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue legend, was a showstopper on the red carpet at this year's fête celebrating the magazine. The 63-year-old flashed an exquisitely taut leg through her thigh-slit at the second and last night of the Vibes Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2017 festival on Saturday. She was joined by her younger daughter Sailor Lee Brinkley-Cook, who along with Brinkley's elder daughter Alexa Ray Joel will be in this year's issue with her. Having a ball in Houston: Christie Brinkley, Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue legend, was a showstopper on the red carpet at the second and last night of the Vibes Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2017 festival on Saturday Staring the camera down: She was joined by her younger daughter Sailor Lee Brinkley-Cook, who along with Brinkley's elder daughter Alexa Ray Joel will be in this year's issue with her Brinkley, who became an iconic part of the magazine's history by covering it three times in a row - 1979, 1980 and 1981 - , wore green on Saturday. Her V-neck sloped down to provide a generous view of her cleavage, and her waistline cinched to emphasize her enviably svelte torso. Hoop earrings poked out through her blonde hairdo, and she kept her footwear simple with a pair of black ankle-strap stilettos. 'So Major Dancing on stage': As Diplo performed at the event, Brinkley and her daughter leapt onstage to enjoy the music with Aly Raisman and this year's Sports Illustrated Swimsuit issue cover girl Kate Upton Meanwhile, her 18-year-old daughter Sailor - product of her fourth marriage to Peter Cook (not the famed comedian) - posed up a storm in a mini-dress. The outfit featured a neckline-to-hemline zip that had been pulled down nearly to her midriff, and she offered the camera the best version of her model glower. Alexa, Sailor's elder sister and confrère in this year's Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue, is her mother's daughter by New York State Of Mind singer Billy Joel. Pro: Brinkley became an iconic part of the magazine's history by covering it three times in a row, in 1979 (left), 1980 (center) and 1981 (right) Diplo performed on the second night of the festival, which took place in Houston, and per Brinkley's Instagram, both she and Sailor took the stage with him. Brinkley posted a photo in which she pouted and arced her honed leg while her daughter, as well as Aly Raisman, danced behind her onstage. Kate Upton, who's covering this year's Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue, was also throwing her hair around to the music in the photo. Share or comment on this article 88
